MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L25 postcode area of Woolton, affecting properties in School Lane, Speak Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.25AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.30PM on 5th February 2021.
